scripts.prepare-build: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir dist --ignore 'src/**/*.test.js'
scripts.copy: cp package.json dist/ && cp -r LICENSE dist/ && cp -r README.md dist/ && cp -r styles dist/
scripts.build: npm run prepare-build && npm run copy
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && rm -rf build/temp
